game.description: Retrieve the ancient artifact from the long-abandoned temple deep within the mystical forest, rumored to hold unimaginable power.
game.objective: Bring the ancient artifact back to the village elder.

tasks.description: Journey through the mystical forest and reach the ancient temple.
Navigate through the deadly traps and puzzles within the temple to retrieve the artifact.
Return to the village elder with the artifact.

game.title: The Quest for the Ancient Artifact
